DATA ANALYST & DEVELOPER

I am a data analyst and web developer based between Fargo, ND, and Minneapolis, MN. As a lifelong creative-type, with a penchant for troubleshooting and organizing, I find that building something amazing, researching data and organizing from code, is the ultimate inspiration. I also love to invistigate and troubleshoot problems.
